channel.title: Marble Hornets
channel.description:
This is posted on Somethingawful and to spare some time, im just going to copy paste the post here
There's a "Slenderman" ARG-type story going on on youtube. The plot is that a guy's friend Alex was filming a movie called Marble Hornets, when he noticed Alex was getting neurotic. He would film everything, even when not running a scene, and Alex turned the tapes over to the friend, and said to never mention them again; Alex then moved away. The main character has been posting snippets from the movies, and they are very creepy and unsettling - many of them have Slenderman either directly haunting Alex, or subtly in the background. It's all very moody. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wmhfn3mgWUI] Here is the Introduction.[/url] There are currently 23 (22 + a ".5") videos, plus this introduction; each video is relatively short, but manages to get a good amount of atmosphere in there. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bn59FJ4HrmU] Entry 1[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JVECb0bYq8w] Entry 2[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b52bwPam7O8] Entry 3[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yBNQZvOkSCw] Entry 4[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6GMQ_FULc4M] Entry 5[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lQGvn82NNQw] Entry 6[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0q3cQjeerNU] Entry 7[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rfAL3hubpoA] Entry 8[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OT25GyRBHy8] Entry 9[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1icUgVa7EYg] Entry 10[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5a4Tm34wwck] Entry 11[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UXKZlwoPfBU] Entry 12[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j-YEsCFM100] Entry 13[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1lxsMHeOGjE] Entry 14[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BFb7eTQmVA8] Entry 15[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5agHXjRdb_8] Entry 16[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IqsAWxVUUIU] Entry 17[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6BsPPQSwdVw] Entry 18[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-qZUgxShlM] Entry 19[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gv54NJa2yhI] Entry 19.5[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1VKridtP5FQ] Entry 20[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N-TCS5_yQj0] Entry 21[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Y7_WP9HOME] Entry 22[/url] Those are all creepy in their own right, but then the uploader got himself a twitter account, and seems to be losing sleep and feeling the paranoia that Alex felt. Also, to add a fun interactive component, an anonymous user named totheark has started uploading cryptic video responses to Marble Hornets, that are getting crazier as the entries go on. Once you're done with the videos, check out the twitter account [url=http://twitter.com/marblehornets]http://twitter.com/marblehornets[/url] , and he links to the various totheark videos. totheark's videos: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NmqDPBu1UaM] Regards (Response to Entry 9) [/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WVtGwViUILk] Operator (Response to Entry 10) [/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dm3CjL6vS18] Deluge (Response to Entry 11) [/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zxPDaFeUzT0] Impurity (Response to Entry 12[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hn42IHeear4] Exit (Response to Entry 13) [/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=46GwQd-X38g] Program (Response to Entry 14)[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q3eq2SZYsEA] Advocate (Response to Entry 15)[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WHFRTgjVYyY] Addition (Response to Entry 16) [/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qw78k0dldHI] Signal (Response to Entry 17)[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-VK-JaLhFIM] Messages (Response to Entry 18) [/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sUI-3lU6bek] Return (Response to Entry 19) [/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j09PpA5fJaQ] Version (Response to Entry 20) [/url]
[url=http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/slenderman]Slenderman[/url] [img]http://knowyourmeme.com/i/27147/original/The_Slender_Man_by_Pirate_Cashoo.jpg?1258506435[/img]

item.title: Marble Hornets
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

This is posted on Somethingawful and to spare some time, im just going to copy paste the post here

There's a "Slenderman" ARG-type story going on on youtube. The plot is that a guy's friend Alex was filming a movie called Marble Hornets, when he noticed Alex was getting neurotic. He would film everything, even when not running a scene, and Alex turned the tapes over to the friend, and said to never mention them again; Alex then moved away.

The main character has been posting snippets from the movies, and they are very creepy and unsettling - many of them have Slenderman either directly haunting Alex, or subtly in the background. It’s all very moody.

Here is the Introduction.
There are currently 23 (22 + a “.5”) videos, plus this introduction; each video is relatively short, but manages to get a good amount of atmosphere in there.
Entry 1
Entry 2
Entry 3
Entry 4
Entry 5
Entry 6
Entry 7
Entry 8
Entry 9
Entry 10
Entry 11
Entry 12
Entry 13
Entry 14
Entry 15
Entry 16
Entry 17
Entry 18
Entry 19
Entry 19.5
Entry 20
Entry 21
Entry 22

Those are all creepy in their own right, but then the uploader got himself a twitter account, and seems to be losing sleep and feeling the paranoia that Alex felt. Also, to add a fun interactive component, an anonymous user named totheark has started uploading cryptic video responses to Marble Hornets, that are getting crazier as the entries go on.

Once you’re done with the videos, check out the twitter account http://twitter.com/marblehornets , and he links to the various totheark videos.

totheark’s videos:
Regards (Response to Entry 9)
Operator (Response to Entry 10)
Deluge (Response to Entry 11)
Impurity (Response to Entry 12
Exit (Response to Entry 13)
Program (Response to Entry 14)
Advocate (Response to Entry 15)
Addition (Response to Entry 16)
Signal (Response to Entry 17)
Messages (Response to Entry 18)
Return (Response to Entry 19)
Version (Response to Entry 20)

Slenderman
